com.craftmend.openaudiomc.api.interfaces

Interface MediaApi

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MediaApiImpl

    public interface MediaApi

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Play a simple sound for a client
      void playMedia(Client client, java.lang.String source, MediaOptions mediaOptions)
      Play a sound for a client with media options (like volume, id, looping, synchronization etc)

      void stopMedia(Client client)
      Stop all non spatial sounds regardless of their ID

      • stopMedia

        void stopMedia(Client client,
               java.lang.String id)
        Stop a specific simple media by ID
        Parameters:
        client - Target client
        id - Sound ID

      • playSpatialSound

        java.lang.String playSpatialSound(Client client,
                                  java.lang.String source,
                                  int x,
                                  int y,
                                  int z,
                                  int radius,
                                  boolean useSurroundSound)
        Create a tracked spatial sound for a client. Defaults to non surround (2d, so just volume based on distance) but you can also enable surround sound, which does just what it sounds like
        Parameters:
        client - Target client
        source - Media source
        x - Static X location in the world
        y - Static Y location in the world
        z - Static Z location in the world
        radius - Radius that the sound can be heard in, in blocks
        useSurroundSound - If surround sound should be enabled
        Returns:
        The ID of the created sound, unique per client

      • stopSpatialSound

        void stopSpatialSound(Client client,
                      java.lang.String spatialSoundId)
        Destroy a spatial audio source
        Parameters:
        client - Target client
        spatialSoundId - The ID of the created sound, unique per client
